entries.name: addr => addrinfoclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the address of ifaddr. nil is returned if address is not available in ifaddr.

entries.name: broadaddr => addrinfoclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the broadcast address of ifaddr. nil is returned if the flags doesn't have IFF_BROADCAST.

entries.name: dstaddr => addrinfoclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the destination address of ifaddr. nil is returned if the flags doesn't have IFF_POINTOPOINT.

entries.name: ifindex => integerclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the interface index of ifaddr.

entries.name: inspect => stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns a string to show contents of ifaddr.

entries.name: name => stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the interface name of ifaddr.

entries.name: netmask => addrinfoclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the netmask address of ifaddr. nil is returned if netmask is not available in ifaddr.

entries.name: vhid => Integerclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the vhid address of ifaddr. nil is returned if there is no vhid.
